## Manhattan Plot

```{r, dpi=300}
resultsBinned <- fread(params$binned_results, header=TRUE, tmpdir="$PWD")

resultsBinned$LOG10P <- case_when(!is.na(resultsBinned$LOG10P) == TRUE ~ resultsBinned$LOG10P,
                                    TRUE ~ resultsBinned$y1)

#prepare data for plotting
df_prep <- manhattan_prep(resultsBinned)

#create plot
p <- manhattan_plot(df_prep,
                    ymax = params$plot_ylimit)

#note for manual ylim setting (if ymax is defined)
if(params$plot_ylimit == 0) {
  limit = NULL
} else {
  limit = c(0, params$plot_ylimit )
    cat(paste("Please note that the Y-axis limit has been set to '", params$plot_ylimit,"'. Please use the 'plot_ylimit' parameter to adapt this behaviour."))
}

#annotatate plot (if it is enabled)
 if(!params$manhattan_annotation_enabled) {
  p
} else {
  p + ggrepel::geom_text_repel(data = df_prep %>% filter(type == "peak"),
                            aes(label=GENE_NAME), color = 1, fontface = "italic")
}
```

## Top Loci

Filtered for a minimun -log<sub>10</sub>(p-value) = `r params$annotation_min_log10p`.

```{r}
annotatedTopHits <- fread(params$annotated_tophits_filename, select = c("CHROM", "GENPOS", "ID", "RSID", "ALLELE0", "ALLELE1", "A1FREQ", "INFO", "N", "TEST", "BETA", "SE", "LOG10P","GENE_NAME", "GENE_CHROMOSOME", "GENE_START", "GENE_END", "DISTANCE"), header=TRUE, tmpdir="$PWD")

annotatedTopHits <- annotatedTopHits %>%
  group_by(GENE_NAME, GENE_CHROMOSOME, GENE_START, GENE_END)

topHitsN <- 
  annotatedTopHits %>%
  summarise(VARIANTS = n()) %>%
  select(VARIANTS)

topHitsLead <- annotatedTopHits %>%
  slice(which.max(LOG10P))

rm(annotatedTopHits)

topHitsGroupedByGene <- right_join(topHitsN, topHitsLead) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(GENE_NAME, VARIANTS, CHROM, GENPOS, RSID, ALLELE0, ALLELE1, A1FREQ, BETA, SE, LOG10P, DISTANCE, INFO, N, TEST) %>%
  unite("Position", CHROM:GENPOS, sep=":")  %>%
  unite("Allele 0/1", ALLELE0:ALLELE1, sep="/")  %>%
  arrange(desc(LOG10P))

# create custom table container
sketch = htmltools::withTags(table(
  class = 'display',
  thead(
    tr(
      th(rowspan = 2, 'Locus (nearest gene)'),
      th(rowspan = 2, 'No. of SNPs'),
      th(colspan = 11, 'lead SNP')
      ),
    tr(
      th('Position'),
      th('rsID'),
      th('Allele 0/1'),
      th('Allele 1 Freq'),
      th('Beta'),
      th('Standard error (SE)'),
      th('-log10(p)'),
      th('Distance to gene'),
      th('Imputation info'),
      th('N'),
      th('Test')
    )
  )
))

datatable(topHitsGroupedByGene,
          container = sketch,
          rownames = FALSE,
          width = "100%")

# output number of toploci for phenotype
loci <- nrow(topHitsGroupedByGene)
toplociN <- data.frame(params$phenotype, loci)
write.table(toplociN, 
            quote = FALSE,
            row.names = FALSE,
            file = paste("loci_", params$regenie_filename, ".txt",
                       sep = ""))

```

## QQ Plot

```{r, results='asis', dpi=300}
regenieTable <- fread(params$regenie_merged, select = c("CHROM","GENPOS","LOG10P","ID", "A1FREQ", "GENE_NAME"), header=TRUE, tmpdir="$PWD")

if(params$plot_ylimit == 0) {
  limit = NULL
} else {
  limit = c(0, params$plot_ylimit )
  pp <- pp + ylim(0, params$plot_ylimit)
  cat(paste("Please note that the Y-axis limit has been set to '", params$plot_ylimit,"'. Please use the 'plot_ylimit' parameter to adapt this behaviour."))
}

cat('\n\n')
cat('### Overall')
cat('\n\n')
pp <- qq_plot(df=regenieTable)
print(pp)

cat('\n\n')
cat('### Split by MAF')
cat('\n\n')
pp <- qq_plot(df=regenieTable,
              mafsplitting = TRUE)
print(pp)

```

Please note that the QQ Plot is split by the following MAFs if any variants fall in the respective interval:

* (0, 0.0005]
* (0.0005, 0.005]
* (0.005, 0.05]
* (0.05, 1]
